citation.title: The evolution of an American small town : an intervention focusing upon re-centralization and diversification

facebook.title: DSpace@MIT: The evolution of an American small town : an intervention focusing upon...
facebook.summary:
Roy Kanode, I thought this might be of interest to you.   A student at MIT wrote a master’s thesis on “A research and design thesis exploring the evolution of a small southwest Virginia farming town named Christiansburg.”
http://dspace.mit.edu/handle/1721.
